Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Posted on Internet
   Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century" (Vols. 1-8) was posted on "The Red Banner of Songun", an Internet homepage jointly run by the U.S. Group for the Study of Songun Politics and the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy.
